Details: Nowboicha - Singra River RB embankment | Chamua | Damage due wear and tear during shower, seepage and raincuts (Approximate 10 Meter) has been observed at Chamuagaon of Singra RB Embankment under North Lakhimpur WR Divison on 20/05/2022
